ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Beatdrop Battledrum [SMTP:Beatdrop@...]
> Sent: Friday, December 17, 1999 8:26 PM
> To: Eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Sol Ro Temple Quest
>
> From: "Beatdrop Battledrum" <Beatdrop@...>
>
> >An individual on our server started a hoax a couple weeks back stating
> >they had made a very powerful bard weapon...how unfortunate some people
> >suffer from mental illness and think this is humerous. I do however
> >believe that it's very probable Walthin's weapon can be quested for in
> >the game. My faction with the temple is "warmly", so I can confidently
> >say it's not an issue of faction. Any rumors, facts, or ideas would be
> >welcome.
> >
> >Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
>
>
> Alright, who was it... Bien or Rokenn? Come forth joker! :p
>
>
--
~Beatdrop Battledrum <Platinum Sphere>
Child of Erollisi Marr
Karana Server
--


You can be sure that it wasn't Bien.. I prefer not to use weapons
if I can. Of course lately my group has been me, ranger, and 4 casters
(mostly priest,enchanters, no real nuker) So unfortunately, I can't give up
what little offensive powers I have.

Bien

> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
